attributes.action: legislate to require the introduction of the single transferable vote (STV) for all British elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unreasonable to require electors to select a single candidate in an election. This leads to a barrier to many independent candidates, in that people who might otherwise vote for them will perceive their vote as being wasted. The single transferable vote allows electors to rank candidates in order of preference, along the lines of "I would prefer candidate A, but if that's not going to happen then I prefer candidate B to candidate C".
